item.description:
This only meetup in Boston that brings together nonprofits and businesses to work on collaboration and partnerships in an informative and fun format. We will be having a short presentation followed by discussion on how it can benefit your organization. Every month we bring one local nonprofit into the spotlight and all the donations go directly to the organization. The spotlight nonprofit will be Jumpstart (http://www.jstart.org...) for our next meetup. Vlora has also provided a special menu for the group. Look forward to seeing you there!

Agenda:

12-12:30pm - Networking with food and drink
12:30;1:45pm - Short introductions, Jumpstart (http://www.jstart.org...) will be our monthly nonprofit spotlight, followed by a brain storming session on the topic of cause marketing.
1:45-2pm - More Networking and collaborating

PS. Remember to bring your own name tag this will help brand your organization more effectively.

Sponsors of the event:

Jobs In Nonprofits (www.jobsinnonprofits.com) and Vlora Restaurant (www.vloraboston.com)
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a name tag - Bring your own name tag please!

group.name: Social Impact Success Community Meetup Group

item.name: Social Impact Circle October Meetup
